disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from The Darkin Scythe.

blurb.value: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.

description.value: Innate: Kayn wields an ancient, sentient weapon, that battles with him for control. Each instance of damage Kayn deals against champions (excluding damage over time) and takedowns causes them to drop orbs, red by melee champions and blue by ranged champions, that are automatically collected upon leaving combat, filling a bar above Kayn's portrait.

description2.value: Once the bar is filled, Kayn can return to the summoning platform to interact with his portrait to either be overwhelmed by Rhaast or expel him to become the Shadow Assassin, or wait 4 minutes until the other form becomes available, reduced by 5 seconds for each collected orb of their type after that. After choosing a form, Kayn transforms into Rhaast or the Shadow Assassin over 6 seconds during which he is invulnerable and untargetable. Kayn cannot select a form if he is unable to cast abilities.

description3.value: The transformation type is decided based on the highest amount of damage dealt to the respective range type. If the two forms are within 8% of each other, the last champion range type hit will determine the transformation. If both types are hit at the same time the trasformation will default to Rhaast. The transformation will permanently empower some of Kayn's abilities and grant him Homeguard.

description4.value: Shadow Assassin: If Kayn has been out of champion combat for over 8 seconds, or he casts Umbral Trespass, he deals 12% − 44% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions as bonus magic damage, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering combat and also applying on the first instance of damage dealt. If this ability is ready, it will not go on cooldown by receiving damage.

description5.value: Darkin: Rhaast heals for 30% − 40% (based on level) of the post-mitigation physical damage that he deals to enemy champions with his abilities.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The bar gets filled up completely at 500 points. Melee orbs grant 2 points per hit and 6 points per takedown. Ranged orbs grant 3 points per hit and 7 points per takedown. Each bar has a bucket system. The bucket starts at 60 points. Each time an orb is taken the system checks if there's an amount of points in the bucket equal to or higher than the amount received from the orb.If there is, Kayn is given an additional orb of the same type he received, while also subtracting that amount of points from the bucket. The bucket fills by 0.8 points per second if out of champion combat for 70 seconds. The amount of points received per orb is then multiplied by 3 − 10.39 (based on minutes). The orbs will be collected even if Kayn dies. Entering transformation will not destroy in-flight projectiles.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Reaping Slash.

blurb.value: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.

description.value: Active: Kayn dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, before swinging his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.

leveling.value: Physical Damage:»75 / 95 / 115 / 135 / 155 (+ 65% bonus AD)«Total Champion Damage:150 / 190 / 230 / 270 / 310 (+ 130% bonus AD)

description2.value: Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

leveling2.value: Non-Champion Damage:»115 / 135 / 155 / 175 / 195 (+ 65% bonus AD)«Total Non-Champion Damage:230 / 270 / 310 / 350 / 390 (+ 130% bonus AD)

description3.value: Darkin: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 55% AD (+ 5% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage is capped against monsters but does not include the bonus damage.

leveling3.value: Capped Monster Damage per Hit:»200 / 250 / 300 / 350 / 400«Total Capped Monster Damage:400 / 500 / 600 / 700 / 800

description4.value: The dash's speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shields will block only a single instance of damage - either the dash or the slash. If the dash is interrupted, Kayn will not swing his scythe. Reaping Slash's swing can be performed quicker if the dash collides with terrain. As the Shadow Assassin, an alternate icon for Reaping Slash is used but has no modified effect. Other abilities can be queued while casting Reaping Slash. All items can be used during Reaping Slash. Stopwatch and Zhonya's Hourglass will not stop the dash or the damage from occurring. Hextech Protobelt-01 will interrupt the dash if used before the dash ends, preventing the slash from happening. If used after the dash ends, Kayn can reposition where the slash happens.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Blade's Reach.

blurb.value: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.

description.value: Active: Kayn performs an upwards sweep with his scythe, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit in a line in the target direction and slowing them by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.

description2.value: Shadow Assassin: Blade's Reach's range is increased by 200. Additionally, Kayn conjures an untargetable living shadow at the casting position to perform Blade's Reach in his stead, reducing the ability's cast time to 0 but applying its effects after a 0.55-second delay.

description3.value: Darkin: Blade's Reach also knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The shadow created by the Shadow Assassin is considered a champion for Turret Plating's gold sharing.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Shadow Step.

description.value: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus movement speed, is ghosted and can ignore terrain collision for 1.5 seconds. Immobilizing effects and polymorph will interrupt Shadow Step.

description2.value: Kayn heals himself upon moving through terrain for the first time and, if he's not in combat with enemy champions, Shadow Step's duration is increased. While inside terrain, Kayn has unobstructed vision.

description3.value: Receiving damage from an enemy champion or dealing damage to them reduces the remaining duration to 1.5 seconds. The effect also cannot remain active out of terrain for longer than 1.5 seconds and will cancel completely if Kayn uses a basic attack.

description4.value: Shadow Assassin: Shadow Step's  cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds at all ranks. Additionally, Kayn gains 100% slow resist and, upon entering terrain, increases the bonus movement speed to 80% for the remaining duration.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * As Rhaast, an alternate icon for Shadow Step is used but has no modified effect. Self immobilizations such as Stopwatch / Zhonya's Hourglass also count for interrupting Shadow Step. Recall is disabled while Kayn is inside terrain. Enemies cannot see Kayn while he is inside of terrain unless they have terrain-piercing vision, such as Heightened Senses, Hawkshot or unobstructed vision. However, enemies will be notified if nearby terrain is infested if Kayn is within 1000 units - with an indicator being placed on the terrain with a direct line between Kayn and the enemy champion. Slightly less than standard sight radius, but more than the camouflage detection radius. Kayn can move up to 550 units beyond the outer-edge of the battlefield. While in terrain, Kayn will not be considered unseen for the sake of Duskblade of Draktharr. If Kayn is inside terrain when the effect ends, he will be placed correspondingly to the nearest valid space.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Umbral Trespass.

blurb.value: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

description.value: Passive: Kayn marks enemy champions he damaged in the last 3.15 seconds.

description2.value: Active: Kayn vanishes and dashes to a marked enemy champion and attaches to them for up to 2.5 seconds, revealing them for the duration. Umbral Trespass can be recast after 0.75 seconds of the attachment and recasts automatically at the end of the effect's duration.

description3.value: Recast: After a 0.75-second delay, Kayn dashes out from their body in the target direction while still being untargetable and deals physical damage to the target.

description4.value: Shadow Assassin: Umbral Trespass gains up to 200 bonus cast range and emerge range. Additionally, emerging will reset The Darkin Scythe's  cooldown.

description5.value: Darkin: Umbral Trespass is modified to deal 10% (+ 13% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's  maximum health physical damage, and heals him for「 70% of the pre-mitigation damage. 」「 7% (+ 9.1% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health. 」

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder. Detonating the ability manually does not. The ability activation happens when Kayn is attached to his target and the channel starts. Kassadin cannot gain a stack for Force Pulse because Kayn is untargetable during the activation. The ability will recast if Kayn is ordered a movement command. The amount of time it takes for Kayn to attach to his target is between 0.5 seconds (cast from max range, not as Shadow Assassin) and 0.25 seconds (cast from point blank range). This duration is fixed, meaning Kayn will attach regardless of how far away the target gets while he is dashing toward them. If the target dies or enters resurrection while Kayn is attached, he will instantly detach and reappear on top of the target's location. This does not occur if Kayn is in the process of emerging from the target. If the target dies, is sent to the Realm of Death, or enters resurrection before the attachment, Kayn will reappear at the target's location after completing the dash. There is no compensation if this happens. If Kayn dies while attached and the recast is available, Umbral Trespass' damage is dealt immediately. If the recast is not available, Umbral Trespass' damage is not dealt at all. Entering resurrection while attached does not deal Umbral Trespass' damage regardless of if the recast is available or not. Kayn will still detach in this case. As Rhaast, Umbral Trespass will not heal if the target dies during the 0.75-second delay before emerging. Umbral Trespass' interactions with crowd control: Becoming stunned or silenced while attached will cause the ability to recast automatically (even during the 0.75-second delay before Kayn is able to recast after attaching). Umbral Trespass cleanses Kayn from drowsiness. Kayn is immune to fear during Umbral Trespass. Roots will not prevent Kayn from initiating the recast. Displacements cannot interrupt the initial dash. If the airborne source applies a debuff, Kayn attaches to his target immediately, ending the dash prematurely in the process. The debuff is also removed briefly after. Until the recast or after the duration, the ability will have had no effect on the target for the purposes of Electrocute or the 'in-combat' status. Spell shields will prevent Kayn from infesting the target, but will do nothing to mitigate the recast when used once he has already infested them. If Kayn targets an enemy that is currently being protected by a spell shield, the ability will simply go on cooldown without making him infest his target. This is also true for Fiora's Riposte. Umbral Trespass cannot be cast on targetable zombie states such as Sion during Glory in Death. The damage is not blocked if the target becomes untargetable. The screen will direct to the target's position upon attaching. As Rhaast, an alternate icon is used for the initial activation of Umbral Trespass.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
